details.description:
Myspace Exclusive!
Gorgeous 1.5 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg ? just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: hardwood floors, spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances, large living room, 1 queen size bedroom and 1 full size bedroom. Gorgeous exposed brick. Heat; Hot Water is included. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
Available 9/1 On-Site Super Small pets OK No broker fee

Incredible, newly renovated huge 1-bedroom in Williamsburg right off the subway in Prime Williamsburg! Right by the waterfront.
Oak hardwood floors, high ceilings, and large windows letting in tons of natural light! Nice L-shaped living/dining area, creating 2 separate spaces.
- Big bedroom with closet - Renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, microwave - Elevator building - On-Site Super
JMZ trains, Domino Park, Peter Luger's, Pies-N-Thighs, Social House Cafe, Deux Chats, Patrizia's of Williamsburg, etc nearby.
No broker fee Available 9/1 Small pets welcome

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances, Microwave

details.description:
Nice new 1 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, sunny kitchen with stainless steel appliances, 1 queen size and 1 twin size bedroom. Heat and hot Water is included. Could be used as a 1 bedroom --OR--- 1 bedroom + office ---OR--- 2 bedroom with small living area. The choice is yours!
Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
Sept 1 move in Small pets OK

Nice new 1 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, sunny kitchen with stainless steel appliances, and heat and hot water is included.
Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan! Montrose L train.
Sept 1 move in Small pets OK

Myspace Exclusive!
1 bedroom layout with extra office! Stainless steel appliances, eat in kitchen. Nice layout!
The building is an extremely well-maintained 1920s prewar featuring stainless appliances, hardwood floors, tons of sunlight, high ceilings and lots of space. Pet friendly, heat; hot water included!
Call today, as this listing will not last.
June 1st move in Small pets OK No broker fee

Myspace Exclusive! Large one bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg ? just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, king sized bedroom, ample closet space, large living room and separate kitchen. Pets are welcome. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
NO BROKER FEE! Small pets OK September 1 move in

2 Bed CORNER UNIT Penthouse with amazing views ready for immediate move in!
Please see video on StreetEasy ad or send message and I?ll send to you!
Unit features: Hardwood floors Vaulted ceiling Gas fireplace Top floor of elevator building. 2 elevator bays make sure you never have to wait! Corner apartment with TONs of natural light Kitchen island perfect for setting up stools for dining Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Efficient PTAC heat and cooling unit for all rooms Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closets
Building features: Affordable parking spots available ButterflyMX intercom Multiple laundry rooms Huge Roof deck with spectacular skyline views Zipcars available Bike storage Go lockers for secure package delivery State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
Pets ok NO FEE! Just 1st and security to move in! Guarantors welcome. $20 app fee per person
Call or text to view the right away. This is priced to GO!

Welcome to 487 Keap, a brand new rental building seconds to Metropolitan/Union Avenue L train Very well maintained ? beautiful common areas including a landscaped roof deck with lounge chairs, bar, and outdoor shower. Full service and spacious gym, bike and additional storage are available.
This apartment is rent stabilized, you can enjoy a rent stabilized home, be protected from sharp increases in rent and have the right to renew your lease for years to come.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Central A/C, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description: Virtual tours available!Beautiful apartment in Greenpoint, prime location!This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedroom(s), stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from McCarren; McGolrick Parks, in addition to dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Keg; Lantern, Brooklyn Barge, TORST, Spritzenha, Northern Territory, Five Leaves, Enid's, Paulie Gee's, Sauvage, Milk; Roses, Calexico.mShort commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

amenities.other: Central A/C, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Roof Access, Shared Outdoor Space

details.description: 1 month free

Virtual tours available!
Beautiful 2 bed / 1 bath apartment in Bushwick, prime location! This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Archie's, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse.
Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the L train, and a short walk to the J, M trains.

Virtual tours available!
Beautiful apartment in East Williamsburg, prime location!
This apartment features spacious living room, queen sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Roberta's, Sweet Science, Honey's, Wayward Social, Syndicated, Guadalupe, Reclamation, Ichiran, Momo Sushi Shack, El Cortez.
Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

Virtual tours available!Beautiful apartment in Greenpoint, prime location!This apartment features a spacious living room, 3 queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, 2 modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from McCarren; McGolrick Parks, in addition to dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Keg; Lantern, Brooklyn Barge, TORST, Spritzenha, Northern Territory, Five Leaves, Enid's, Paulie Gee's, Sauvage, Milk; Roses, Calexico.mShort commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances, Central A/C

details.description:
Welcome to Casa Hope Williamsburg?s new luxury development!
Sunny units with oversized windows throughout, and gorgeous finishes Steps from the L / G trains, commute to Union Square in only 13 minutes door to door!
Tons of building amenities:
Fitness center Rooftop terrace Business center On-site garage parking Lounge on 7th floor Mini lounge nook to each floor Elevator Bike room Parking garage (additional fee)
The kitchen comes equipped with brand new stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. Gorgeous well-designed light wood cabinetry, white stone countertops and backsplashes. Modern bathrooms feature a deep soaking spa bathtub, as well as modern vanity with oversized mirror, storage cabinet space and matte black finishes. Other features include oak flooring throughout and generous closet space. Trash Chute to each floor.
Perfect location with an easy commute to the city and tons of restaurants, bars and cafes nearby Short walk from McCarren Park and the Bedford L train area

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Refrigerator/oven, Central A/C, Stainless steel appliances, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description:
Find Your Ideal Manhattan Home! This stylishly updated 2-bedroom apartment combines contemporary finishes with a prime location. You?ll be steps away from the best dining, shopping, and entertainment the city has to offer. Don?t let this unique opportunity pass by!
Highlights:
Open and roomy layout Sleek kitchen and bathroom design Beautiful hardwood floors Generous closet space In-unit washer and dryer Arrange a visit today and step into your future home!

Find Your Ideal Manhattan Home! This stylishly updated 2-bedroom apartment combines contemporary finishes with a prime location. You?ll be steps away from the best dining, shopping, and entertainment the city has to offer. Don?t let this unique opportunity pass by!
Highlights:
Open and roomy layout Sleek kitchen and bathroom design Beautiful hardwood floors Generous closet space In-unit washer and dryer Arrange a visit today and step into your future home!

Discover this exquisite 2-bedroom, 1-bath building in Williamsburg!
Unit features: -Enjoy lofty ceilings, expansive windows, and polished hardwood floors - Delight in a gourmet kitchen with top-tier appliances -Relax in the spa-inspired bathroom
Enjoy building perks: -Cutting-edge gym -Elevator convenience -Relaxing sauna -Entertaining game room -Rooftop oasis with panoramic city vistas
Book your tour now and bask in the brilliance of this upscale abode!

Discover this exquisite 3-bedroom, 2-bath building in Williamsburg!
Unit features: -Enjoy lofty ceilings, expansive windows, and polished hardwood floors - Delight in a gourmet kitchen with top-tier appliances -Relax in the spa-inspired bathroom
Enjoy building perks: -Cutting-edge gym -Elevator convenience -Relaxing sauna -Entertaining game room -Rooftop oasis with panoramic city vistas
Book your tour now and bask in the brilliance of this upscale abode!

BRAND NEW LUXURY BUILDING nestled in the vibrant Greenpoint neighborhood!!
APARTMENT FEATURES: Gleaming Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Appliances Central Air Conditioning; Heating Inquire about the availability of Private Balconies Inquire about the possibility of In-Unit Laundry!
BUILDING AMENITIES: Rooftop Deck with Stunning Views Elevator for Convenience On-Site Laundry Rooms State-of-the-Art Fitness Center Recreational Room Comfortable Tenant Lounge Package Room for Deliveries Bike Storage Parking available($300 monthly) Pet-Friendly Environment First; Security - NO BROKER FEE.
Conveniently located near L train at Lorimer and right next to McCarren Park.

Prime Crown Heights Living at 1499 Bedford Ave!
Discover the epitome of modern living at 1499 Bedford Ave, a new building in the heart of Crown Heights. Located steps from Eastern Parkway and multiple subway lines, and within walking distance of Grand Army Plaza, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park, this residence offers unparalleled convenience and vibrant city life.
Building Amenities:
State-of-the-art fitness room Pet wash station Laundry facilities (in-unit laundry in some units) Social lounge with game room Furnished rooftop with panoramic city views Second-floor public terrace Open workstations Dedicated mail room
Unit Features: Private terraces and balconies in select units Kitchen islands in select units Large windows with abundant natural light Stunning views of NYC skyline, Prospect Park, and neighborhood streets
Welcome to 1499 Bedford Ave?where luxury, community, and convenience meet. Experience the best of Crown Heights living.

Rent Stabilized!
Offering both single floor AND duplex units, you can find any type home you'd like at 85 Graham Ave! In the bustling neighborhood of East Williamsburg, you will feel a perfect blend of old school and new. Find authentic family-owned small eateries next to newly opened rave-reviewed restaurants. Visit trusted long-standing dive bars next to upscale cocktail clubs. Go shopping all along Graham and Flushing Avenues and take a short walk to both Williamsburg AND BedStuy!
Conveniently located off the L, J, M, and G trains, as well as the B43, B46, and B60 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher Central A/C and Heat Washer/Dryer IN UNIT! Excellent light from extra large windows
BUILDING FEATURES: Finished Roof Deck 2 Convenient Entrances Pet Friendly!! (just 1 time fee)

amenities.other: Central A/C, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Roof Access, Shared Outdoor Space, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description:
The Kent House is in arguably THE MOST desireable neighborhood in Brooklyn. Right on the Williamsburg Waterfront with gorgeous river and city views, all the restaurants, coffee shops, bars, art and music venues, plant shops, parks, farmers markets, grocers, and absolutely anything and everything else you could desire right outside your door. Be warned: the luxury experience you are offered inside the building may leave you feeling torn about whether to go out and enjoy the bustle of the neighborhood or stay in and enjoy your own amenities right here at home!Conveniently located off the J. M, and L trains, as well as the B32, B62, and Q59 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher Central A/C and Heat Private Balcony Excellent light from extra large windows
BUILDING FEATURES: Bike Room Courtyard Elevator Fitness Center Laundry Room Tenant Lounge Package Room Finished Roof Deck
First; Security NO FEE

amenities.other: Central A/C, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Roof Access, Shared Outdoor Space

details.description:
BRAND NEW LUXURY BUILDING nestled in the vibrant Greenpoint neighborhood!!
APARTMENT FEATURES: Gleaming Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Appliances Central Air Conditioning; Heating Inquire about the availability of Private Balconies Inquire about the possibility of In-Unit Laundry!
BUILDING AMENITIES: Rooftop Deck with Stunning Views Elevator for Convenience On-Site Laundry Rooms State-of-the-Art Fitness Center Recreational Room Comfortable Tenant Lounge Package Room for Deliveries Bike Storage Parking available($300 monthly) Pet-Friendly Environment First; Security - NO BROKER FEE.
Conveniently located near L train at Lorimer and right next to McCarren Park.

BRAND NEW LUXURY BUILDING in the beautiful Vinegar Hill area of DUMBO!! Enjoy unbelievable views across both the Manhattan Bridge and Brooklyn Bridge. Visit the countless parks nearby such as John St Park, Main St Park, Trinity Park, Brooklyn Bridge Park, Cadman Plaza Park, Whitman Park and even more! Become a patron of some of the long standing and delicious LOCAL local restaurants such as Bridge Coffee and still enjoy those late night cravings spots we pretend we don't know and love (*cough Shake Shack) just a few blocks further. Take a little old school Brooklyn, mix in some new luxury living, and that's how you'll end up falling in love with your new home here!
Conveniently located off the A, C and F trains as well as the B57, B62, B69 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher; Microwave Central A/C; Heat Inquire for Private Balconies! Inquire for IN UNIT laundry!
BUILDING FEATURES: Courtyard Roof Deck Elevator Laundry Room Fitness Center Rec Room Tenant Lounge Package Room Bike Storage Pets Allowed
First; Security NO BROKER FEE!

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Central A/C, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Roof Access, Shared Outdoor Space, Washer/Dryer In Unit
